summary: Completed comprehensive testing of digital payment awareness platform. All backend APIs working correctly after fixing demo transaction bug. Frontend fully functional with all pages, navigation, and integrations working properly.
passed_tests: Landing page loads with hero section, stats, features, and CTAs
Learn page displays educational modules with progress tracking
Module detail page shows content and allows marking as complete
Practice page allows demo payment transactions (UPI, wallet, card)
Impact page displays analytics and growth charts
Security page shows safety tips and FAQs
Navigation between all pages works correctly
Backend API /api/modules returns all modules
Backend API /api/progress tracks user completion
Backend API /api/demo-transaction creates demo transactions
Backend API /api/analytics returns metrics
Session ID generation and storage in localStorage
Progress percentage calculation in Learn page
Form validation in Practice page
Module completion updates correctly
All payment method selections work (UPI, wallet, card)
FAQ accordion interactions work properly
Navbar navigation between all pages
CTA buttons function correctly
Data visualization displays metrics properly
